I think we'll see more older players do well now too. Four 40+ Open champs in the last 6! Not just a youngster's game #TheOpen #golf
@MackerOnTheMed I also think we'll see more older players do well now too. Four 40+ Open champs in the last 6! Not just a youngster's game.
@MackerOnTheMed ..maybe even the likes of Bjorn & Jimenez could come back & have one last tilt at winning one. Even Monty could do a Watson!
@MackerOnTheMed hahaha love it. Lots of inspiration if you're European. The Scandi players will be inspired by & will feed off that and...
So greatest final round in history for @henrikstenson yday? Or Norman '93, Watson '77, Miller '73, Mickelson '13 etc..? Discuss! #TheOpen
Still stunned by #TheOpen yesterday! I still can't believe it. Hope for all @RyderCupEurope's majorless stars now eh ðŸ˜‰ #MickelsonVsStenson
@MackerOnTheMed How ru feeling today, still stunned by that final round? I still can't believe it. Hope for all our majorless stars now eh ðŸ˜‰

@henrikstenson Major Championship record of 264. Legendary! The Open record, the Major record. Noone apart from Phil was even close #TheOpen

@MackerOnTheMed On that evidence it's Henrik's time. And Phil has had a lot of luck apparently; although I haven't been watching it!
@MackerOnTheMed Defo we do. If he gets top ten ima be happy tho. Good experience for the future. Maybe he's our Bubba without the bigotry ðŸ‘ðŸ½
@MackerOnTheMed I haven't dude. Lots of Brit & Euro stars killing it I hope?

@MackerOnTheMed Weather not great this wkend. I see Sergio stealing it tomorrow as Henrik & Big Mick get caught up in a duel! #TheOpen
@MackerOnTheMed Just responding to your tweet to the Beeb. Not sure what I meant so I OurBoys-ified it!
@MackerOnTheMed hahahaha. I'm not so sure. If Sergio can win one soon I think he might rediscover the old youthful Sergio and go & win many.
@MackerOnTheMed Hopefully this is Phil down the stretch on Sunday to let in Henrik or Sergio...
